# Invitation to Tender: Chiller and Water Tower Maintenance
## Notification
* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01013465
* **Published Date:** November 15, 2022
* **Closing Date and Time:** December 19, 2022, at 14:00 ET

## Description
The Canadian Government is inviting bids for the maintenance and repair of chillers and water towers at various sites across the province of Quebec (excluding NCR).

## Project Details
* **Scope of Work:** All maintenance and repair of chillers and water towers, including tower speed regulators
* **Locations:** Various Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's sites in Quebec (excluding NCR)
* **Requirements:** Bidders are required to have the necessary skills and equipment to perform the maintenance and repairs in a timely manner

## Tender Instructions
* **Accompanying Documents:** All tender documents, including specifications, plans, and drawings, are available on the BuyandSell service provider's platform
* **Bid Submission:** Only electronic bids will be accepted and can be submitted through BuyandSell
* **Contract Officer:** Jean-François Lemay, Contract Officer, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, can be reached for any inquiries at jean-francois.lemay@agr.gc.ca or 343-571-9706

## Evaluation
* **Evaluation Criteria:** The tender will be evaluated on the basis of the bidder's experience, technical capabilities, and financial proposals
* **Award Decision:** The contract will be awarded to the bidder who meets the requirements and complies with the evaluation criteria

## Conditions
* **Site Visit:** A mandatory site visit will be held at the Saint-Hyacinthe Research and Development Centre on November 29, 2022, from 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM
* **Availability of Tender Documents:** All tender documents, including addendums and clarifications, will be available on BuyandSell

## Important Notes
* **Tender Fee:** There is no tender fee associated with this tender
* **GST/HST:** The bidder is responsible for charging and reporting Goods and Services Tax (GST) and Harmonized Sales Tax (HST) as applicable

## Timing and Deadlines
* **Closing Date:** December 19, 2022, at 14:00 ET
* **Late Bids:** Late bids cannot be accepted

The bidder must have a valid Government Services Agreement (GSA) in place before tender
